title: Dragon mask

properties.name: description
properties.value: Dragon masks are possible rewards from Treasure Trails and can be worn in the head slot. Chromatic dragon masks can be obtained from hard Treasure Trails, while metal and lava dragon masks can be obtained from elite Treasure Trails.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Dragon mask

Dragon masks are possible rewards from Treasure Trails and can be worn in the head slot. Chromatic dragon masks can be obtained from hard Treasure Trails, while metal and lava dragon masks can be obtained from elite Treasure Trails.

All of the dragon masks can be stored independently from each other in the treasure chest of a player's costume room.

Item GE Price
Bronze dragon mask 5,825
Iron dragon mask 5,814
Steel dragon mask 6,077
Mithril dragon mask 7,404
Adamant dragon mask 6,920
Rune dragon mask 15,049
Lava dragon mask 2,591,249
Green dragon mask 7,478
Blue dragon mask 9,189
Red dragon mask 6,198
Black dragon mask 35,468
